name: Brian Lara Cricket
overview: Brian Lara wrote his name into the record books with a majestic innings of 375 for West Indies, the highest score ever in a test match. Just weeks later, he was again in record-breaking form reaching a phenomenal 501 not out for Warwickshire, the greatest score achieved in first class cricket. Now it's your turn to compete against the world's top teams. Whether you play test matches or exciting one day internationals, you'll have full control over batting, bowling and fielding. Brian Lara cricket is the most authentic simulation ever.
